short_description: united wholesale scotland is a groceries store based in glasgow, united kingdom.
long_description: united wholesale (scotland) ltd. is the premier cash and carry operator in scotland, having three significant depots supplying independent retailers with famous named products in grocery, soft drinks, chill, frozen, household, non foods, paper products, beer, wines, cigarettes and tobacco. the organisation's staff, management and directors thrive on challenges. our mission statement is a commitment to support and grow the independent retail sector by providing top class branded products at competitive prices together with retail advice and merchandising support that benefit the end consumer. the day-today fascia group was started in 2004 and now we have over 500 independent retailers supporting our scheme. from our humble beginnings in 2002 this organisation is now within the top 15 cash and carry groups in the uk. in scotland we are recognised as the most innovative and driven wholesaler and our competitors recognise that: "we lead, others follow.". we provide you with the right tools and services to help your business grow.

generated_description: united wholesale scotland, legally known as united wholesale scotland ltd., is a leading cash and carry operator based in glasgow, scotland. the company supplies independent retailers with a wide range of products, including groceries, soft drinks, chilled items, frozen goods, household products, non-food items, paper products, beer, wines, cigarettes, and tobacco. established in 2002, united wholesale scotland ltd. operates three significant depots and supports over 500 independent retailers. the company is recognized for its innovative approach and competitive pricing, positioning it among the top 15 cash and carry groups in the uk.
